content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Mr. Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would have been €1,800 per month, as that was the maximum I was willing to pay within my budget. However, Mr. Schmidt insisted on a minimum of €2,000 per month, which I could not afford.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Given that we did not reach an agreement on the rental price, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as a 5 out of 10. I appreciate the effort Mr. Schmidt made to negotiate, but unfortunately, the price was still beyond my budget.
name: Haoyu Wang
